deal.product_description: The Refurb Unlocked Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 512GB Smartphone is a high-end mobile device featuring a 6.8 120Hz 1440x3088 display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 Processor, 8GB RAM, and 512GB storage. It has a 200MP main camera and a 12MP front camera, as well as a 5,000mAh battery. The phone comes with a 1-year Allstate warranty and has a model number of SM-S918U1. It is designed to provide a fast and seamless user experience, making it suitable for various tasks such as gaming, video watching, and productivity.

It is also compatible with a range of devices and comes with a charger, making it easy to keep the battery topped up. The battery is a great choice for anyone looking for a reliable and high-capacity power source and is available at a discounted price. With its advanced features and high capacity, the Eco-Worthy 3,584Wh 12V 280Ah LiFePO4 Bluetooth Lithium Battery with Charger is a great choice for anyone looking to upgrade their power system.

The Insignia 75 Class F50 Series LED 4K UHD Smart Fire TV is a high-definition television that features a large 75-inch screen and 4K resolution. The TV has a native resolution of 3840 x 2160 pixels, providing users with a crisp and clear picture. It also features HDR10 and HLG, allowing for a wider range of colors and contrast. The TV is a smart device, featuring Alexa enabled Fire TV and access to popular streaming services such as Netflix, Disney+, and YouTube. The Insignia TV is perfect for users who want a high-quality viewing experience and access to a range of entertainment options.

Additionally, it is compatible with a wide range of accessories and has a long-lasting battery life. The device is also water and dust resistant, making it a great option for those who want a reliable and durable smartphone.

Additionally, it comes with the Bose Connect app, which allows users to customize their listening experience. This certified refurb item is backed by a two-year warranty from Allstate, providing peace of mind for buyers. With its compact design and durable construction, the Bose SoundLink Flex SE is a great option for those looking for a reliable and versatile Bluetooth speaker.
